schema.title: string
schema.newUser: Show to all new users (should be false most times)

announcements.title: Bug Fix â€“ Auto management not working
announcements.body: Fixed a bug introduced in last update where auto management was not applied for new torrents. Thanks for the reports @CharlosMartinez & @Martzki

announcements.title: Thanks @Drun555 in Github
announcements.body: Added some more options to Torrent download preferences for sequencing, auto management, and more.

announcements.title: Thanks @VishveshC in Github
announcements.body: Updated the build process to include a login.html file

announcements.title: Thanks @AdamSEY in Github
announcements.body: They added Top 100 tab in trending and file size info when searching with plugins

announcements.title: API Call Fixes
announcements.body: If you were stuck on 4.4.4 because some of the functionality was broken. This update is fixing that :)

announcements.title: Custom Tabs Update
announcements.body: Added way to hide/change the botton tabs visible on mobile

announcements.title: Font Size Update
announcements.body: Added a setting page for adjusting the app's font size

announcements.title: Download Filters Update
announcements.body: Added some filters to the download tab.

announcements.title: Trending Tab Update
announcements.body: Added Trending Tab to show movies and tv shows currently trending according to TMDB.

announcements.title: Update
announcements.body: Pushed a couple UI fixes and an attempt at whitelisted IP authentication

announcements.title: Plugin Search
announcements.body: qBitTorrent Plugin Search. You can also manage plugins and add public plugins directly from the WebUI.

announcements.title: Fixes
announcements.body: Fixing incompatibilities with qBitTorrent 4.4.4. If you spot anything not working, please create an issue. Coming soon: Plugin Search

announcements.title: More Updates
announcements.body: Added rarbg as provider. Deployed my own proxy. Added GA.

announcements.title: Torrent Information
announcements.body: Feast your eyes on data from your downloads. (Please request any data points that you'd like if they're not there)

announcements.title: New Updates in Repo
announcements.body: Standalone server (run iQbit on its own port, cool for targeting mobile devices only), torrent rename, torrent name popover on tap

announcements.title: Welcome to iQbit
announcements.body: Welcome to the new iQbit. Whenever new updates are pushed to the repo, you'll get notifications like these in the WebUI.
